remarks: A vector is zero iff its span is the isomorphism of lattice zero. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dih0vb.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dih0vb.o $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
dih0vb.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dih0vb.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dih0vb.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dih0vb.z $e |- Z = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dih0vb.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dih0vb.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dih0vb.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
dih0vbN $p |- ( ph -> ( X = Z <-> ( N ` { X } ) = ( I ` .0. ) ) ) $.
